alert.note: Alert for Western Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 26 at 6:40PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Clay County through 715 PM EDT... At 639 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kingsley, or 7 miles northeast of Keystone Heights, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Clay County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
